actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to establish United States trade negotiating objectives regarding equitable access to technology.
short_title: Fair Access to Technology Act of 1986

summary.text: Fair Access to Technology Act of 1986 - Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to establish as U.S. negotiating objectives the reduction or elimination of barriers to, and foreign policies and practices which limit, U.S. access to foreign-developed technology. Requires the United States, in pursuing such objectives, to take into account U.S. policies in making available to foreign nationals technology developed by U.S. laboratories.

titles.title: Fair Access to Technology Act of 1986
A bill to establish United States trade negotiating objectives regarding equitable access to technology.
